Hist\u00f3ria espetacular\\, \u00f3timos: Very good game. I was very impressed. The \"butterfly effect\" system is out of this world\, and the story had some interesting twists too.I am definitely going to be doing at least a second playthrough of this game. It runs smoothly and it's just an overall incredible game. If you like anything at all by TellTale games\, you'll LOVE Until Dawn!!
